tool_description: This API is used to optimize scheduling plans for tasks in process.
name: WindSchedulingAPI
title: WindSchedulingAPI

api_list.name: scheduling pro
api_list.description: The Scheduling API Pro Version.Tasks limitation: Unlimited
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://windschedulingapi.p.rapidapi.com/api/Schedule/V1/solution"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "windschedulingapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
